activities: We collect your personal information on the contact us page that consists of your name and email address, we will only use this information to contact you in response to any questions or inquiries you submit to us in regards to our payroll, tax, and software services.  In speaking with you we collect information dealing with your company’s specific needs such as number of employees, locations, and payroll information.
personaldata: The only personal information that you are required to enter on the site is your email address and your name.    In speaking with you the data collected would be used to find an agent in the countries you have payroll and tax needs for your employees.
